title: 08 perches solid build house for sale in Malabe
details:
Dear Sir /Madam.

please find the property details.

11 perches 100 meters to main road , located at Udawatte road, Malabe

04 beds with attached bath rooms, living, dining, pantry, kitchen, TV lobby, rooftop, A/C rooms etc..,

Parking for 2 vehicles with roller shutters, maids room with attached bath. 2900 sqf,

Highly residential area. 20 foot road acces
